title: Echo dot in India - The Experience so Far !
tags: how to setup amazon echo in india
description: Since google home is unavailable in India, I bought the echo dot, just to see how it goes. I must say, IM PRETTY IMPRESSED. Watch this video to know what's' it like to use Amazon Echo dot in India  Buy it on Amazon -   You can reach me here  Website -  YouTube -  Facebook - Twitter -  Instagram -   Which background music did I use?   What camera do I use?  Canon 70D  What mic do I use? Blue Yeti and Video Mic pro (depends on requirement)  What tripod do I use? Manfrotto MVKBFR  What video editor do I use? Final Cut Pro  What computer do I use? iMac 2015 for editing and a ThinkPad for casual work
